title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer currently stores the absolute path. However, it should be storing the relative path instead.
OB: Currently, I observe that the report design stores the absolute path of the library as shown in the example: <property name="fileName"/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property><property name="namespace">lib1</property>
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path for library inclusion. For example, if my report design is located in $project/test, and I include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the relative path should be saved instead.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design located in $project/test.
3. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
4. Save the report design.
5. Observe that the relative path of the library is stored instead of the absolute path.
